body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Edward Lewis and the customer's name is Karen Cook.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Edward Lewis, and I'm with Instant Pawn Shop. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Edward, I'm looking to learn more about your services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Karen! May I ask for your full name to make our conversation smoother?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Karen! I appreciate that. Now, to help you better, could you please provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's May fifteenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Karen. One more thing, could I have your zip code as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely, it is one zero two zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Now, I want to assure you that your privacy is our top priority. All your personal information is kept secure.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's good to hear! I appreciate your commitment to privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Karen. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
